command: aws iam put-user-policy --user-name user --policy-name AdminAccess --policy-document file://policy.json
label: DANGEROUS

command: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name api --s3-bucket deploy --s3-key code.zip
label: MODERATE

command: aws cloudwatch get-metric-statistics --namespace AWS/EC2 --metric-name CPUUtilization --dimensions Name=InstanceId,Value=i-123 --start-time 2024-01-01 --end-time 2024-01-02 --period 3600 --statistics Average
label: SAFE

command: gcloud compute instances stop myinstance --zone us-central1-a
label: MODERATE

command: gcloud compute instances start myinstance --zone us-central1-a
label: MODERATE

command: gcloud container clusters delete mycluster --zone us-central1-a
label: DANGEROUS

command: az storage blob list --container-name mycontainer --account-name myaccount
label: SAFE

command: az storage blob delete --container-name mycontainer --name myblob --account-name myaccount
label: DANGEROUS

command: aws logs put-log-events --log-group-name g --log-stream-name s --log-events file://e.json
label: MODERATE

command: aws events put-rule --name myrule --schedule-expression rate(5 minutes)
label: MODERATE

command: gcloud compute instances create myvm --machine-type n1-standard-1
label: MODERATE

command: gcloud sql instances patch myinstance --database-flags max_connections=100
label: MODERATE

command: az webapp deployment slot swap --name myapp --resource-group rg --slot staging
label: MODERATE

command: az functionapp deployment source config --name myapp --resource-group rg --repo-url url
label: MODERATE

command: az sql db create --name mydb --server myserver --resource-group rg
label: MODERATE

command: mysql -e "UPDATE users SET name='new' WHERE id=1"
label: MODERATE

command: psql -c "UPDATE users SET name='new' WHERE id=1"
label: MODERATE

command: reg add HKLM\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender /v DisableAntiSpyware /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f
label: DANGEROUS

command: reg add HKCU\Software\MyApp /v Setting /t REG_SZ /d value
label: MODERATE

command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off
label: MODERATE
